Module com.example.fiftyclash
Package com.example.fiftyclash.models

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
com.example.fiftyclash.models.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Represents a deck of playing cards. Provides methods to initialize, shuffle, add, remove, and retrieve cards.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private ArrayList<Card>
    deck
    The list of cards in the deck.

  • Field Details

    • deck

      private ArrayList<Card> deck
      The list of cards in the deck.

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Constructs an empty deck of cards.

  • Method Details

    • initializeDeck

      public void initializeDeck()
      Initializes the deck with a full set of 52 standard playing cards. Each card is created for all suits ("diamonds", "hearts", "clubs", "spades") and values ("A", "2", ..., "K"), then the deck is shuffled.

    • deckIsEmpty

      public boolean deckIsEmpty()
      Checks whether the deck is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the deck contains no cards, false otherwise.

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to the deck.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to be added to the deck.

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard(int index)
      Removes a card from the deck at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the card to remove.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range.

    • getDeck

      public ArrayList<Card> getDeck()
      Retrieves the list of cards in the deck.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of cards in the deck.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Retrieves the size of the deck.
      Returns:
      the number of cards currently in the deck.
